title: THE SURPRISE NO ONE EXPECTED (Corki ADC) [League of Legends]

embed.description: Hey all! here is a match that I did not entirely expect to go well but hey, Corki ADC is still viable somewhat. Become a Channel Member today: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl05d4gaceCCWk5zyezQt5g/join BLS Clothing: https://blsclothing.com/ (Enter nicolas at checkout to save 10% on all orders) Donate to the channel: https://streamlabs.com/nodragonsplz Join The Discord: https://discord.gg/9Ja5xsY Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/NoDragonsPlz Follow me on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nodragonsplz Tweet @ me: https://twitter.com/NoDragonsPlz Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/NoDragonsPlz/ Apparently Hashtags work now!

body: Ended up trying Corki ADC. I know it's not OP but hey, it's still fun.

replies.body: How is Corki ADC a surprise? What else is he if not an ADC?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=EBBIvmVK,discussion-id=YryYGde4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-03T00:38:05.279+0000)
>
> How is Corki ADC a surprise? What else is he if not an ADC?

a odd midlaner lel.
In earlier seasons corki was an adc, idk what is surprising here.
I'm surprised that someone thinks that corki isn't an adc.
